metadata.title: Tuesday, 7th October, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development when the following Wards in Bwacha Parliamentary Constituency will be electrified under the Rural Electrification Authority Programme
parts: (a)    Munga;
(b)    Chinyanja;
(c)    Munyama;
(d)    Muwowo West; and
(e)    Muwowo East.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the tarring of the road linking Eastern Province to Muchinga Province will commence;
(b)    why the road is not on the Link Zambia 8000 Road Project;
(c)    what the source of funds for tarring the road is; and
(d)    what has caused the delay in upgrading the road.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    whether traders are allowed to conduct their business operations at shopping malls that are still under construction; and
(b)    what measures are taken to protect the lives of the shopping public at such premises.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what the causes of the poor performance by Grade 12 pupils at Kalabo and Lukona Secondary Schools in Kalabo District are; and
(b)    what the teacher-pupil ratio at the two schools is.
(a)    when a local court will be built at Mawilo in Nkeyema District considering that the District already has a local court officer; and
(b)    when the Kalumwange Local Court in Lalafuta Ward will be rehabilitated.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when the construction of the Nakonde Secondary School will be completed;
(b)    what the total cost of the project is;
(c)    how much money had been spent on the project as of 30th June, 2014;
(d)    what the time-frame for completion of the project is; and
(e)    when the School will be renamed Donald Siwale Secondary School.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the construction of the Miulwe-Nangula and Limulunga-Mushitwambunu roads in Luena Parliamentary Constituency will commence; and
(b)    what has caused the delay in commencing the construction works.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health when the construction of Toka Toka Health Post in Nchelenge Parliamentary Constituency will be completed.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when a bridge across Lunsemfwa River connecting the Chiefdoms of Shikabeta and Mbosha will be constructed; and
(b)    what the estimated cost of the project is.
(a)    when the construction works at the Sesheke One Stop Border Post will be completed; and
(b)    when staff houses will be constructed. QUESTIONS FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W1    Mr P Phiri (Mkaika) - to ask the Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health:
(a)    how many women groups, by name, in Katete District, benefited from the Women Empowerment Fund in 2012 and 2013;
(b)    how much money was disbursed to each group; and
(c)    how much, in total, was disbursed to the District. W2    Mr Sichula (Nakonde) - to ask the Minister of Finance:
(a)    how much money, in form of Toll Tax, the Government collected from Nakonde District between 2011 and 2014, year by year; and

(b)    of the amount collected, how much was allocated to various projects in Nakonde and on what projects. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address – Motion (23rd September) - Resumption of Debate - (Mr Shakafuswa).
